name: NextRev: Daisanshu Denki Shunin Gijutsusha Shiken
name_original: NextRev: Daisanshu Denki Shunin Gijutsusha Shiken
description:
NextRev: Daisanshu Denki Shunin Gijutsusha Shiken is an educational puzzle game developed by Media5. It was originally released in 2013. media5 published the game.
NextRev: Daisanshu Denki Shunin Gijutsusha Shiken is available on PS Vita.
